- Read THEOPP.csv from SourceData
- modify WT column so it's filled in for obs rows
- save into DerivedData

```{r}

d <- read.csv("SourceData/THEOPP.csv", na = ".")
kable(head(d, 20))

```

```{r}

d %>%
  group_by(ID) %>%
  mutate(WT = na.omit(WT)) %>%
  write_derived_data("data") ## DerivedData/data.csv

```
